alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central New Castle, central Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s and east central Kent Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delaney Corner, or 12 miles northwest of Dover, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover, Smyrna, Milford, Camden, Clayton, Cheswold, Bowers, Woodside, Viola, Hartly, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Hazlettville, Delaney Corner, Dover Base Housing, Dover Speedway, Green Spring, Rising Sun, Wyoming, Felton and Frederica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
